Breakdown/Pyro/Hiss/Scavenger/Punch/Double Punch/Manterror/Bumblebee/Injector:



Punch sighed.  "I think I'll do that.  Punch out." the double agent said as 
he deactivated the comlink with Zardus.  He walked out of the bridge, 
pondering if it would be safe to continue being a double agent.  No doubt his 
long absence would start up suspicions in the Predacons.  Slag, he didn't 
even know who was in control of the Predacons anymore!

===

Manterror, Injector, and Bumblebee walked up to the shuttles.

Injector cupped his mouth and yelled, "HEY!  WE WANNA JOIN THE ALLIANCE!"

---

A few seconds later, the four Oblitercons in one of the shuttles ran out of 
their shuttle, weapons trained on the three visible Predacons, none of the 
Oblitercons seeing Double Punch.

"You think we just accept everyone who comes along to join the Alliance?" 
Breakdown asked.

"No." Manterror replied.  "But I think you'll want to let us join."

"Why?"

"Or else you'll die."

"You can't kill us!" Pyro yelled, raising his flame cannon to point at 
Manterror's face.

"No, not all of you.  Just him." he replied as he pointed at Breakdown.

Breakdown heard a voice from behind and turned.

Double Punch suddenly appeared, a pincher open, two missiles pointed at 
Breakdown's face.

"Welcome to the Alliance!" Breakdown yelled with a fake smile.

"Glad to be a part of it." Double Punch said, the other three ex-Predacons 
bursting out with laughter, the eight bots boarding the shuttle.
